item.title: Home Depotâ€™s sales are improving, but it says consumers are still cautious about spending
item.description: Home Depot is mired in a sales slump as homeowners put off major projects.

item.title: SoftBank posts blowout quarterly gains at Vision Fund tech arm
item.description: The company lodged a steep quarterly increase on Vision Fund gains after swinging back to black in the three months to June.

item.title: Singapore Airlines shares fall 6% as profit nearly halves amid intensifying competition
item.description: The fall in profits was due to "increased capacity and stronger competition in key markets," the airline said.

item.title: Sony raises guidance on gaming strength, quarterly operating profit beats estimates
item.description: Sony raised sales guidance for the full year and posted operating profit that smashed analyst expectations after a strong quarter for its gaming busin...

item.title: Nissan shares plunge over 10% after downbeat quarterly results, production-cut plans
item.description: The automaker posted disappointing second-quarter results and announced reductions in production and staff.
